meanings.definition: Move or cause to move downwards.
meanings.sent1: She lowers the book onto the table.
meanings.sent2: The sun lowers in the sky as evening approaches.
meanings.sent3: The magician lowers the curtain to reveal his final trick.
meanings.sent4: As the temperature drops, it lowers the chances of rain.
meanings.sent5: The elevator slowly lowers to the ground floor.

meanings.definition: Reduce the level or amount of something.
meanings.sent1: Eating less sugar lowers your risk of cavities.
meanings.sent2: The company lowers its prices to attract more customers.
meanings.sent3: He lowers the volume of the music to hear the doorbell.
meanings.sent4: Her smile instantly lowers the tension in the room.
meanings.sent5: Regular exercise lowers stress levels and improves mood.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment that covers the lower part of the body.
meanings.sent1: Her skirt has a beautiful lace trim on the lowers.
meanings.sent2: The designer added pockets to the lowers of the dress.
meanings.sent3: The cat got tangled in the fabric of the lowers while playing.
meanings.sent4: He proudly displayed the intricate embroidery on the lowers of his robe.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's costume had shimmering sequins on the lowers.
